TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Palinkaan, title = Palinkaan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palinkaan} }

S.FORM: Palinkaan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Palinkaan a niyaro', 543 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,537 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 31% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 480 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 69% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,057 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 17%, Truku 8%, Bunun 2%, Paiwan 1%, Tayal 1%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Palinkaan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hoalien ko Palinkaan a niyaro', 543 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,537 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 31% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 480 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 69% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,057 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 17%, Troko 8%, Bonon 2%, Paiwan 1%, Tayal 1%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
